items.details:
Reading

Please watch the video of the story we will read it tomorrow in class.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hLASwjg7fQo

Please complete the definition paper that was given today. Use your own words—it's fine to check a dictionary for help, but be sure to explain in your own way.

Readworks Assignment 1 - The Star Maiden: An Ojibway Legend

1. Have students go to www.readworks.org/student
2. Students enter class code YU6GQ2
3. Tell your students that their default password is 1234

The spelling test words for this Friday are

fierce
baring
flexing
crouching
swipe
hut
chores
skinny
sleek
fertilizer 
gourd
dizzy
paw
drolling 
Lentils

Please prepare for the test on Friday

Math 
Complete Additional Practice 1-1 and 1-2

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at
 https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E t o help strengthen their skills.

Science 
The Think Like a Scientist mystery bag will start on Wednesday, as today we had a long assembly. Have your mystery bag ready.

 Please remember to check the schedule for the next day and have the correct books ready. Keep all homework in the homework file until it is checked, then move it to the finished file. Thanks for staying organized!
